title: Flu Shot | GoHealth Urgent Care
description: Flu shots may be available at select GoHealth Urgent Care locations. We have flu shots for all ages, including high dose shots for those 65 and older and pediatric shots for children under 2 at select centers.
cleaned_text: Protect yourself from the flu today. Flu season typically starts in October and can cause up to [45 million cases](https://www.cdc.gov/flu/about/burden/index.html) of illness each year, according to the CDC. Get your annual flu vaccine from most of our GoHealth Urgent Care locations to protect yourself and reduce the spread to others. We have flu shots available for the whole family at any of our convenient locations open 7 days a week, 365 days a year. Additionally, you can request a flu shot during any visit at one of our centers.
